text: The Niers is a river in Germany and the Netherlands. It is a right tributary of the Maas (Meuse). The river is long. The Niers flows through MÃ¶nchengladbach, Viersen, Wachtendonk, Geldern and Goch before flowing into the Maas near Gennep, Limburg (Netherlands). Category:Rivers of North Rhine- Westphalia Category:Rivers of the Netherlands Category:Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Niers
